name: Decontaminate
description:
Decontaminate is a 2D top down shooter and role-playing adventure game. The goal of the game is to purify the planet by cleansing the three contaminated sources. The player must survive in this dangerous world by carefully using the shining rose to keep them safe.

Input

Action

L Stick

Move Character / Pan Map

R Stick

Aim Gun / Zoom Map

A

Interact

LB

Melee Attack

LT

Shoot

RB

Place Flower

Select Button 

Toggle Map Screen

Menu Button

Pause

This game was made for Game Dev 2

Gameplay Programmer: Joseph Jelinek

Game Designer: Qixuan Chen

World and Level Designer: Thomas Casale

Sound Designer and Project Manager: Luyang Feng

Narrative Designer: Erik Rizk

Art: Qi Li    

Enemy AI Programmer: Quang Gia Nguyen
